Projects

Lorem ipsum, dolor sit amet consectetur adipisicing elit. Impedit totam enim, soluta excepturi officia quia eos quasi possimus aliquid, at iste vero quibusdam tenetur porro amet eaque voluptas est reiciendis.

Simple Weather App: JavaScript

My basic weather app that allows users to input a location and receive current weather information. This includied working with APIs, handling user input, and displaying data dynamically on the webpage.

Command Line Trivia Game

Simple, text-based trivia game that runs in the command line. This project helped me explore basic programming concepts, such as variables, conditional statements, and loops, while creating an interactive game.

Home Network Security Audit

I conducted a security audit of my home network. This project involved analyzing network devices and traffic patterns, while implementing best practices to safeguard from potential threats.

Raspberry Pi Home Automation

Yet another home automation system using a Pi and various sensors. This allowed me to explore IoT concepts, and interfacing with different hardware to control lighting, temperature, and security features.
